casebody.data:
CLAYBORN
v.
NOVANT HEALTH, INC. No. COA07-183. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed February 5, 2008. Certification Date February 25, 2008. Appeal from Forsyth (04CVS4100).

Cases reported without published opinion. Plaintiff's Appeal: dismissed in part, affirmed in part, Defendant's Appeal: affirmed.
